channel.title: CVE Feed for WAVLINK TECHNOLOGY Ltd. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WAVLINK TECHNOLOGY Ltd. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-32622|2024-08-02T15:25:35.711Z -- wavlink%20technology%20ltd. -- wl-wn531ax2
item.description: Improper neutralization of special elements in WL-WN531AX2 firmware versions prior to 2023526 allows an attacker with an administrative privilege to execute OS commands with the root privilege.

item.title: CVE-2023-32612|2024-08-02T15:25:36.259Z -- wavlink%20technology%20ltd. -- wl-wn531ax2
item.description: Client-side enforcement of server-side security issue exists in WL-WN531AX2 firmware versions prior to 2023526, which may allow an attacker with an administrative privilege to execute OS commands with the root privilege.

item.title: CVE-2023-32620|2024-08-02T15:25:35.706Z -- wavlink%20technology%20ltd. -- wl-wn531ax2
item.description: Improper authentication vulnerability in WL-WN531AX2 firmware versions prior to 2023526 allows a network-adjacent attacker to obtain a password for the wireless network.

item.title: CVE-2023-32613|2024-08-02T15:25:35.667Z -- wavlink%20technology%20ltd. -- wl-wn531ax2
item.description: Exposure of resource to wrong sphere issue exists in WL-WN531AX2 firmware versions prior to 2023526, which may allow a network-adjacent attacker to use functions originally available after login without logging in.

item.title: CVE-2023-32621|2024-08-02T15:25:36.328Z -- wavlink%20technology%20ltd. -- wl-wn531ax2
item.description: WL-WN531AX2 firmware versions prior to 2023526 allows an attacker with an administrative privilege to upload arbitrary files and execute OS commands with the root privilege.
